thread.title: MaxC

author: MaxC
title: MaxC
text: After selecting the wrong tyres online, the office quickly amended my order and confirmed immediately via email. As advised, the email was there the next morning, giving me an estimated 2 hour fitting slot and the technician called to let me know he would be with me earlier than the estimated time which was perfect. 2 tyres fitted in no time at all and I would recommend this service to anyone.
